title: Gain low lp and Lose large amounts
body: So i was on a huge lose streak and I finally came back with wins. And I understand I shouldve been getting low lp then, but ive been winning over and over. Getting 14-16-18 lp per win and then one loss ends up around 20+ loss of lp. Whats happened? My MMR is normal, I dont understand someone who knows help?

replies.body:
It works by team
If you say dou que with someone higher and your team has higher mmr than the other team you are in favor to win so you lose more and win less

And vise versa if yor team is favored to lose you gain more for a win and less per loss


Tip: at the start of game hit enter twice and type fed to see stats

riot uses team mmr to "predict" the winner, if the predicted team wins they get a low 14 or whatnot, but if the predicted losing team wins, they get alot more lp than if the other team won. Same with losing but in reverse, if you were predicted to lose, you lose less than if you were predicted to win and lose.

Soooo in other words.. the system is fucked.

being on the predicted winning team has no benefits whatsoever, when being on the predicted losing team guarantees you more IP with a win and less with a loss.

and it has nothing to do with your skill, just with whoever you happen to get placed with and whatever their MMR happens to be.

so fair.
